name: Wise Slicer
description:
Entry for Mini-Jam 75 (theme: wisdom, restriction: weight must be a mechanic)

Gain wisdom through self cleaning and healing, slice away the self-destructing thoughts and indulge you better self. Cut stuff. I think it's pretty fun :)

Known bugs:

  • Highscore doesn't work (CORS issue, but I enabled it on my server, so I don't know what...)
  • Slicing more than 2 texts rarely works
  • Sometimes slices don't get registered
  • Meshes do not split at the right intersections
  • Some audio glitching when switching screens

Sadly the main mechanic ate away all my time and it is still buggy, but i finished it. I think that is most important for me.

Have fun!
